text: @realDonaldTrump Mr. President keep your eye on the nursing homes & assisted living facilities, we know they r inflating the numbers 2bring back covid19, there is a problem with food poisoning in some facilities, making elderly sick so they can call it Covid!! @GovAbbott they r harming r elderly!
